reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of MATH 101, MATH 103, MATH 105, MATH 121, SCIE 001.
Cross listed with Stat 251. Students in the Faculty of Applied Science must register in Stat 251.
Select 1 lecture and 1 lab in the same term.
Labs begin the second week of classes.
Labs begin the second week of classes
APSC students register in Stat 251. Some seats reserved for CPSC students.
Note: please do not register in this course unless you can also find an open seat in a lab section that does not conflict with your schedule. We are not able to overload our labs for any reason, so if you are unable to find a seat in a lab section that does not conflict with yoru schedule, please do not register for the class.
description: Probability models, random variables and vectors, estimation, testing, regression, analysis of variance, goodness of fit, quality control. (Consult the Credit Exclusion list within the Faculty of Science section of the Calendar).
